channel.title: How to use vote for cash? [PI]

item.title: How to use vote for cash? [PI]
item.dc:creator: @www.sagi-x.com www.sagi-x.com
item.description:
@www.sagi-x.com wrote:

Does your system use checkvotes??? If so you could use something like this: if (playerCommand.equalsIgnoreCase("claim")) { if(c.checkVotes(c.playerName)) { c.getItems().addItem(995, 10000000); c.sendMessage("Thank you for voting and your contribution."); } }

Read full topic

item.source: How to use vote for cash? [PI]

item.title: How to use vote for cash? [PI]
item.dc:creator: @avirunes avirunes
item.description:
@avirunes wrote:

I feel embarressed to ask, but i followed a vote for cash tutorial and am not sure how to actually make players receive the cash in game or a vote command. do i need to add these myself and how to do it :F. I have only posted the below so you can help me figure out commands or whethor i need to add.

[code]heres guide i followed

Alright, so you all know that Pixelthis released a Vote4Cash script? Yeah…I’ll make it very clear for you - All credits goes to Pixelthis for the script, I only take credit for making this tutorial!

People is now selling this script wich he released, and I think that it’s a dickmove and all. I’m therefore releasing it to you, along with a fix for accounts with a space in their names. So, basically, here it is. Oh, and Pixelthis, if you want this removed - Let me know!

Requirements: A brain, Ability to C&P, FileZilla

Alright, so lets get started, eh? First of all, server-sided. (This is for PI, but I’m sure you can make it work for delta aswell!)

Open up Client.java, and add these imports at the top:
Code:

import java.io.BufferedWriter;
import java.io.BufferedReader;
import java.io.IOException;
import java.net.URL;
import java.net.MalformedURLException;
import java.io.InputStreamReader;

Once you’ve done that, declare this:
Code:

public static boolean checkVotes(String playerName) {
try {
URL url = new URL("http://urlhere/vote.php?type=checkvote&username="+playerName.replace(" ", “%20”));
BufferedReader reader = new BufferedReader(new InputStreamReader(url.openStream()));
String results = reader.readLine();
if(results.length() > 0) {
if(results.equals(“user needs reward…”))
return true;
else
return false;
}
} catch (MalformedURLException e) {
System.out.println(“Malformed URL Exception in checkVotes(String playerName)”);
} catch (IOException e) {
System.out.println(“IO Exception in checkVotes(String playerName)”);
}
return false;
}

You see the part where it says “urlhere”? We’ll get back to that later. Also, in here, I’ve included the part that fixes accounts with spaced names. If you don’t know anything about this, don’t ask. I myself ain’t the best coder and I will not bother explaining the code for you.

Alright, now you’ve gotta find your Loginmethod. To find this, simply search for the message you get when you login. Example: “Welcome to blablabla!”

Once you’ve found that, add this in there:
Code:

if(checkVotes(playerName)) {
getItems().addItem(ItemID, Amount);
sendMessage(“Thank you for voting!”);
}

Replace “ItemID” and “Amount” with…Yeah, you got it.

Alright, now save and compile. You’re done serversided!

Now, make a new file called “vote.php” and put this in it:

Code:

<?php /** * @author Stuart * @version 1.1 UPDATED: 06.09.2010 * @comment fixed a few bugs */ /** * mysql database hostname */ define("MYSQL_HOST", "localhost"); /** * mysql username to connect to the database server */ define("MYSQL_USERNAME", "Username"); /** * mysql password the password to connect to the database server */ define("MYSQL_PASSWORD", "Password"); /** * mysql database the database name in which you have your vote table setup */ define("MYSQL_DATABASE", "Database"); /** * vote url this is the url which where users will be sent to on voting */ define("VOTE_URL", "Vote URL"); /** * The number of hours between voting */ define("VOTE_HOURS", 12); /** * connect() this function is used to connect to the mysql database server. */ function connect() { if (!@mysql_connect(MYSQL_HOST, MYSQL_USERNAME, MYSQL_PASSWORD)) die("Could not connect to mysql database: " . mysql_error()); if (!@mysql_select_db(MYSQL_DATABASE)) die("Could not select mysql database: " . mysql_error()); $tables = mysql_list_tables(MYSQL_DATABASE); while (list($temp) = mysql_fetch_array($tables)) { if ($temp == "votes") { return; } } query("CREATE TABLE `votes` ( `playerName` VARCHAR( 255 ) NOT NULL , `ip` VARCHAR( 255 ) NOT NULL, `time` BIGINT NOT NULL , `recieved` INT( 1 ) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0')"); } /** * query(string query) this function is used to query the mysql database server. */ function query($s) { $query = @mysql_query($s); if (!$query) die("Error running query('" . $s . "'): " . mysql_error()); return $query; } /** * anti_inject(string text) this function is used to make sure no injections can be made. */ function anti_inject($sql) { $sql = preg_replace(sql_regcase("/(from|select|insert|delete|where|drop table|show tables|#|\*|--|\\\\)/"), "", $sql); $sql = trim($sql); $sql = strip_tags($sql); $sql = addslashes($sql); $sql = strtolower($sql); return $sql; } /** * clean_request(int timestamp, string username) this function is used to delete any entries if they have already expired. */ function clean_request($time, $username) { $query = query("SELECT * FROM `votes` WHERE `playerName`='" . $username . "'"); if (mysql_num_rows($query) > 0) { $row = mysql_fetch_array($query); $timerequested = $row['time']; if ($time - $timerequested > VOTE_HOURS * 3600) query("DELETE FROM `votes` WHERE time='" . $timerequested . "'"); } } /** * vote_entries(string ip) this function is used return the number of rows within the table */ function vote_entries($ip) { $query = query("SELECT * FROM `votes` WHERE ip='" . $ip . "'"); return mysql_num_rows($query); } /** * This is the actual working of the script please do not touch anything below if you do not know what you are doing... */ if (isset($_POST['submit']) || isset($_GET['username']) && isset($_GET['type'])) { connect(); if ($_POST['submit']) { if(@fsockopen($_SERVER['REMOTE_ADDR'], 80, $errno, $errstr, 1)) die("Sorry but you have port 80 open, this is to stop voting by proxy address."); if(isset($_COOKIE['voted'])) die("Sorry but it looks like you have already voted..."); $username = anti_inject($_POST['username']); $ip = gethostbyaddr($_SERVER['REMOTE_ADDR']); clean_request(time(), $username); if (vote_entries($ip) == 0) { setcookie ("voted", "yes", VOTE_HOURS * 3600); query("INSERT INTO `votes` (`playerName`, `ip`, `time`) VALUES ('" . $username . "', '" . $ip . "', '" . time() . "')"); header("Location: " . VOTE_URL . ""); } else { die("You have already voted once today."); } } elseif ($_GET['type'] == "checkvote") { $username = anti_inject($_GET['username']); $query = query("SELECT * FROM `votes` WHERE `playerName`='" . $username . "'"); if (mysql_num_rows($query) == 1) { $results = mysql_fetch_array($query); if ($results['recieved'] == 0) { query("UPDATE `votes` SET `recieved`='1' WHERE `playerName`='" . $username . "'"); die("user needs reward..."); } else { die("user been given reward..."); } } else { die("Vote not found..."); } } } ?> Vote4Cash

Server name here - Vote4Cash

Username:
 

Alright, now you see at the top where it says “Username”, “Password”, “Database”, and “Vote URL”? Yeah, before we proceed, paste your URL for voting where it says Vote URL, so it looks like this:

Code:

define(“VOTE_URL”, “http://www.blablablalblalbla.com/VOTESHIT/”);

Yeah, I guess you got it. Okay, so now, we have to give us a place to host the .php file! Alright, start off by going to Free Web Hosting, Free Templates, Free Tutorials and More - Zymic and make an account. Once you’ve done this, go to “Create new web host account” and do so. Once you’ve done it, login to it and you’ll see something like this:

That’s the information you need for FileZilla later on. Alright, so now lets proceed to MySQL. Click on “Database Management” and you’ll get this page:

Alright, now fill out the forms and remember what you put. Now, go look at your vote.php again and you’ll see this at the top:

Code:

define(“MYSQL_USERNAME”, “Usernameyouputhere”);
/**

  • mysql password the password to connect to the database server
    /
    define(“MYSQL_PASSWORD”, “Passwordyouputhere”);
    /    *
  • mysql database the database name in which you have your vote table setup
    */
    define(“MYSQL_DATABASE”, “databasenameyouputhere”);

Alright, so now you’re done! Also, remember to create the database and the user (Lol). Now, open up FileZilla and connect using the FTP information that you found. Now, simply drag and drop your finished vote.php into it, and let it load. Now, go to the url that you choosed for your web host account and put /vote.php after it and see if the page loads. If it does, copy the URL and go back to your client.java

Find this again:

Code:

	URL url = new URL("http://urlhere/vote.php?type=checkvote&username="+playerName.replace(" ", "%20"));

Replace ONLY the http://urlhere/vote.php text with your URL that you just copied. Walla, you’re done! Run your server and have fun!

NOTE: The money will be given when you click “Vote now”, not when you vote on the voting site. This can be abused.

Rep & Thanks is appreciated, but not needed! Post errors etc. below![/code]

Read full topic
item.source: How to use vote for cash? [PI]
